issue.title: Add outstanding models for RobotX competition

content.raw:
As for the dock symbols, this is the only drawing I found:

![080616_Detect_and_Deliver.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/369045534-080616_Detect_and_Deliver.jpg)

This gives the dimensions for the cruciform. The triangle has base 1 meter and height 1 meter. The circle has diameter 1 meter.  These can be modeled as flat planes with the colored shape on it

This gives the dimensions for the cruciform. The triangle has base 1 meter and height 1 meter. The circle has diameter 1 meter. These can be modeled as flat planes with the colored shape on it
